translations: 绑架；拐骗（kidnap 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: In his whole miserable, messed-up life he'd never considered anything so callous as kidnaping.
sentences.translation: 在他悲惨、混乱的一生中，他从未想到过像绑架这样冷酷无情的事。

sentences.sentence: But the news is full of the kidnaping of most of the children who served with Ender in Command School.
sentences.translation: 但是新闻中全都是绑架那些曾与安德一起在指挥学院中服役的孩子们的消息。
